summary: Migration finale du projet GROUPE YAMA+ pour déploiement autonome hors Emergent - VALIDÉE. Toutes les fonctionnalités testées fonctionnent correctement sans dépendances Emergent.
critical_code_review_comments: Google OAuth button ('Continuer avec Google') is visible on login page but disabled - shows alert when clicked. This is expected per AuthContext.js migration.
Some product images still use external URLs (unsplash, pexels) - only category/hero images were migrated to local paths
context_for_next_testing_agent: Migration finale validée. Le projet fonctionne de manière autonome sans aucune dépendance Emergent. Les images locales sont dans /public/assets/images/.

homepage_and_navigation.hero_carousel: PASS - Uses local category images for carousel
homepage_and_navigation.category_links: PASS - All 5 categories (electronique, electromenager, decoration, beaute, automobile) found and clickable

authentication.admin_login: PASS - admin@yama.sn / admin123 logs in successfully
authentication.token_generation: PASS - JWT token returned on login
authentication.auth_me: PASS - /api/auth/me returns user data with valid token
authentication.google_oauth: DISABLED - Shows alert per AuthContext.js migration (expected)

admin_dashboard.dashboard_access: PASS - Admin redirected to /admin after login
admin_dashboard.stats_display: PASS - Shows revenue (1,358,000 FCFA), orders (48), products (28), clients (37)
admin_dashboard.products_management: PASS - Admin can access product list

migration_verification.local_images: VERIFIED - Category images and logo use local paths (/assets/images/)
migration_verification.google_auth_disabled: VERIFIED - Shows alert instead of redirecting to Emergent OAuth
migration_verification.backend_standalone: VERIFIED - Backend runs without Emergent dependencies
